pr_title: JBTM-3272 Run the string serialization code test against a specific s…

timeline.bodyText: there is referred the wrong JBTM jira here
timeline.author: ochaloup

timeline.bodyText: Is it really good to name the test based on the Jira name? It's more common to name the testcase base on what functionality it provides.
timeline.author: ochaloup

replies.bodyText:
A more accurate name would be
read_records_created_before_sha_0b511d470f7ab8dedf585cb14d4900170684621b
Anything else is not going to capture the intent of the test - namely to verify that JBTM3262 does not break backwards compatibility.
Other than this is this "PR good to go".
replies.author: mmusgrov

timeline.message: JBTM-3249 Verify that later revisions of Narayana can read old log records
JBTM-3249 Verify that later revisions of Narayana can read old log records
